meanings.definition: To clean or rinse a body part with a stream of water or other liquid.
meanings.sent1: She douched her feet after walking in the muddy garden.
meanings.sent2: Every morning, he douched his face with cold water to wake up.
meanings.sent3: The cat accidentally douched itself with the water hose, creating a funny scene.
meanings.sent4: The waterfall douched the rocks below, creating a refreshing mist.
meanings.sent5: The car wash douched the vehicle with soapy water, leaving it sparkling clean.

meanings.sent1: The bully was known as the school's biggest douched.
meanings.sent2: She realized her friend was a douched after he betrayed her trust.
meanings.sent3: The douched tried to cheat his way through the game but failed miserably.
meanings.sent4: The movie villain was portrayed as a douched who always got what he wanted.
meanings.sent5: In the story, the douched character learned the value of kindness and changed his ways.
